raw_comment: From this graph I notice that there are more players of color than there are head coaches of color. I wonder how these graphs might be different if they did them in past years. I think there would be a huge difference. This affects my community because this reflects racism in today's world. This shows that even though we are all supposed to be equal we still aren't. My headline for this graph would be "Racism on the Field".
ace_sentences: I notice that there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
I wonder how these graphs might be different in past years.
I think that these graphs would be very different in past years.
This situation reflects racism in today's world.
All people are supposed to be equal.
However, all people are not equal.
The headline is: Racism on the Field.
